evidence.claim: One Health Direct utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and data services.
The platform processes healthcare transactions using X12 standards, including 837 claim submissions.
They support FHIR for data sharing with EHR systems.
HL7 messaging is part of their interoperability solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in healthcare data exchanges with support for X12 and API integration.
matched_use_cases: Utilizing X12 transactions for claims processing
Supporting eligibility and benefit verification via 270/271
Integration with providers for electronic health data exchanges
